name: PowerProsperityFlashBriefingbyRandyGage
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Enable this Flash Briefing and receive a short, useful prosperity tip every weekday from Randy. It’s the perfect way to start your day, motivated and focused for success. Once the skill is enabled, create an Alexa routine, add the Power Prosperity Flash briefing skill, and select the time you want Randy to work with you on your mindset.

This skill is to help your personal growth and development. It’s all about expanding your prosperity consciousness – the window through which you view the world. New York Times bestselling author Randy Gage will help you blow up limiting beliefs and replace them with beliefs that empower you to become more successful.

For more than 30 years, Randy has been helping people like you achieve more success and prosperity in their lives. 

Just say Alexa, enable Power Prosperity Flash briefing to get started.

Want more interaction with Randy Gage?

Enable the Randy Gage skill and ask Alexa for some these unique benefits:

- Play the Power Prosperity Podcast

- Subscribe to the Power prosperity Podcast 
- Immediate Prosperity tips to alter your thinking

- Opt in for Email Alerts from Randy Gage

- Play Randy’s Speaker Demo Video 

- Order a copy of Randy's new book.

- Order other resources from Randy's online store.

Learn more about the Randy Gage Amazon Alexa skill at https://randygage.com/alexa

Skill developed by Doug Devitre International, Inc. https://alexa.dougdevitre.com
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
